introduction.paragraph: This request returns all the roles in the specified database.

topic.title: Request
topic.body: This request does not require any particular request header or query parameter.

unordered-list.list-item: 200 OK â€“ Returns the list of roles as an array of strings

body.paragraph: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The message body contains the list of roles in a JSON array. Each element of the array is a string representing the name of a role in the specified database.
The following request returns all the roles in the database cookbook.
body.code-block: GET /cookbook/_role/ HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:4985 Content-Type: application/json

HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 140 Content-Type: application/json Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway
["moderator", "chef", "san francisco"]
